description.koreana: 프리미어, 스트레아, 필리아, 레인과 우정을 다졌다
description.russian: Укрепите свою дружбу с Премьер, Стреей, Филией и Рейн.
description.schinese: 和普蕾蜜亚、斯朵蕾雅、菲莉亚、伶茵加深友情
description.spanish: Profundiza en tu amistad con Premiere, Strea, Philia y Rain.
description.tchinese: 和普蕾蜜亞、斯朵蕾雅、菲莉亞、伶茵加深友情

description.english: Grow close to Asuna, Leafa, Sinon, Lisbeth, Silica, and Yuuki in Kirito Mode.
description.japanese: キリトモードでアスナ、リーファ、シノン、リズベット、シリカ、ユウキと交流を深めた
description.brazilian: Aproxime-se de Asuna, Leafa, Sinon, Lisbeth, Silica e Yuuki no modo Kirito.
description.french: Renforcer vos liens avec Asuna, Leafa, Sinon, Lisbeth, Silica et Yuuki en mode Kirito
description.german: Komme im Kirito-Modus Asuna, Leafa, Sinon, Lisbeth, Silica und Yuuki näher.
description.italian: Approfondisci l'amicizia con Asuna, Leafa, Sinon, Lisbeth, Silica e Yuuki in modalità Kirito.
description.koreana: 키리토 모드로 아스나, 리파, 시논, 리즈벳, 시리카, 유우키와 교류를 다졌다
description.russian: Наладьте близкие отношения с Асуной, Лифой, Синон, Лизбет, Силикой и Юки, играя за Кирито.
description.schinese: 桐人模式中，和亚丝娜、莉法、诗音、莉兹贝特、西莉卡、有纪加深交流
description.spanish: Llévate bien con Asuna, Leafa, Sinon, Lisbeth, Silica y Yuuki en modo Kirito.
description.tchinese: 桐人模式中，和亞絲娜、莉法、詩音、莉茲貝特、西莉卡、有紀加深交流

description.english: Grow close to Kirito, Asuna, Leafa, Sinon, Lisbeth, Silica, Agil, Klein, Yuuki, Yui, and Argo.
description.japanese: キリト、アスナ、リーファ、シノン、リズベット、シリカ、エギル、クライン、ユウキ、ユイ、アルゴと友情を深めた
description.brazilian: Aproxime-se de Kirito, Asuna, Leafa, Sinon, Lisbeth, Silica, Agil, Klein, Yuuki, Yui e Argo.
description.french: Renforcer l'amitié avec Kirito, Asuna, Leafa, Sinon, Lisbeth, Silica, Agil, Klein, Yuuki, Yui, Argo
description.german: Komme Kirito, Asuna, Leafa, Sinon, Lisbeth, Silica, Agil, Klein, Yuuki, Yui und Argo nahe.
description.italian: Fai amicizia con Kirito, Asuna, Leafa, Sinon, Lisbeth, Silica, Agil, Klein, Yuuki, Yui e Argo.
description.koreana: 키리토, 아스나, 리파, 시논, 리즈벳, 시리카, 에길, 클라인, 유우키, 유이, 아르고와 우정을 다졌다
description.russian: Подружитесь с Кирито, Асуной, Лифой, Синон, Лизбет, Силикой, Эгилем, Кляйном, Юки, Юи и Арго.
description.schinese: 和桐人、亚丝娜、莉法、诗音、莉兹贝特、西莉卡、艾基尔、克莱因、有纪、结衣、亚鲁戈加深友情
description.spanish: Llévate bien con Kirito, Asuna, Leafa, Sinon, Lisbeth, Silica, Agil, Klein, Yuuki, Yui y Argo.
description.tchinese: 和桐人、亞絲娜、莉法、詩音、莉茲貝特、西莉卡、艾基爾、克萊因、有紀、結衣、亞魯戈加深友情

description.english: Reach affinity level 4 with all friends (excluding additional characters).
description.german: Erreiche Zuneigung 4 in jeder Freundschaft (Zusatz-Charaktere ausgenommen)
description.french: Atteindre le niveau d'affinité 4 avec tous les amis (hors personnages annexes)
description.italian: Raggiungi il liv. di affinità 4 con tutti gli amici (pers. agg. esclusi).
description.koreana: 모든 프렌드의 우호도를 4로 만들었다 (추가 캐릭터 제외)
description.spanish: Alcanza el nivel 4 de afinidad con todos tus amigos (excluyendo personajes adicionales).
description.schinese: 所有好友的友好度到达４（不包含追加角色）
description.tchinese: 所有好友的友好度到達４（不包含追加角色）
description.russian: Достигните 4 ур. близости со всеми друзьями (кроме доп. персонажей)
description.japanese: 全フレンドの友好度を４にする（追加キャラは除く）
description.brazilian: Alcance o nível 4 de afinidade com todos os amigos (com exceção de personagens adicionais).

description.french: Terminer 12 quêtes en coop intense.
description.italian: Completa 12 missioni Coop hardcore.
description.spanish: Completa 12 misiones cooperativas duras.
description.japanese: エクストラ共闘クエストを１２種類クリアした
description.brazilian: Complete 12 missões coop. extremas.

displayName.japanese: 超高レベルプレイヤー

description.french: Atteindre le niveau 270.
description.italian: Raggiungi il livello 270.
description.spanish: Alcanza el nivel 270.
description.japanese: レベル２７０以上に到達した
description.brazilian: Alcance o nível 270.

description.french: Terminer toutes les quêtes de héros (solo).
description.italian: Completa ogni missione eroe in solitaria.
description.spanish: Completa las misiones de héroe en solitario.
description.schinese: 完成所有的英雄任务（单人）
description.tchinese: 完成所有的英雄任務（單人）
description.japanese: 全てのヒーロークエスト（ソロ）をクリアした
description.brazilian: Complete todas as Missões de Herói solo.

displayName.schinese: 那张脸和那个声音……不会有错的！
displayName.tchinese: 那張臉和那個聲音……不會有錯的！
displayName.japanese: その顔、その声……間違いない！

description.french: Retrouver Sachi.
description.italian: Incontra Sachi.
description.spanish: Reúnete con Sachi.
description.japanese: サチと出会った
description.brazilian: Encontre-se com Sachi.

displayName.schinese: 好厉害……三人的歌声产生了共鸣……！
displayName.tchinese: 好厲害……三人的歌聲產生了共鳴……！
displayName.japanese: すごい……三人の歌が共鳴して……！

description.french: Éteindre le canon à neige.
description.italian: Ferma lo sparaneve.
description.spanish: Apaga la máquina de nieve.
description.japanese: 降雪施設の活動を停止させた
description.brazilian: Desligue a máquina de neve.

displayName.japanese: 沈みゆく哀しみの女王

description.french: Vaincre la Reine du blizzard.
description.italian: Sconfiggi la Regina delle bufere.
description.spanish: Derrota a: Reina de las Nieves.
description.japanese: スノーストーム・クイーンを倒した
description.brazilian: Derrote a Rainha da Nevasca.

description.french: Vaincre la Menace gelée.
description.italian: Sconfiggi la Minaccia gelata.
description.spanish: Derrota a: Amenaza congelante.
description.japanese: フリージングメナスを倒した
description.brazilian: Derrote a Ameaça Congelante.

displayName.japanese: そのときを、楽しみにしてるよ

description.english: Receive mail from an unknown sender.
description.french: Recevoir le message d'une personne inconnue.
description.italian: Ricevi email da un mittente sconosciuto.
description.spanish: Recibe un correo de un desconocido.
description.schinese: 接收寄信人不明的信件
description.tchinese: 接收寄信人不明的信件
description.japanese: 差出人不明のメールを受け取った
description.brazilian: Receba uma mensagem de um desconhecido.

description.english: Defeat Snowstorm Ereshkigal on Extreme difficulty.
description.french: Vaincre l'Ereshkigal du blizzard en difficulté Extrême.
description.italian: Sconfiggi l'Ereshkigal delle bufere a difficoltà estrema.
description.koreana: Extreme 모드에서 스노우 스톰 에레시키갈을 쓰러뜨렸다
description.spanish: Derrota a: Ereshkigal de nieve en dif. extrema.
description.schinese: 在Extreme模式击败冰风暴埃列什基伽勒
description.tchinese: 在Extreme模式擊敗冰風暴埃列什基伽勒
description.russian: Победите Эрешкигаля Бури на высоком ур. сложности.
description.japanese: Extremeモードでスノーストーム・エレシュキガルを倒した
description.brazilian: Derrote Ereshkigal da Neve na dificuldade extrema.

description.english: Defeat Cocytus Nifta on Extreme difficulty.
description.french: Vaincre le Cocytus Nifta en difficulté Extrême.
description.italian: Sconfiggi la Nifta del Cocito a difficoltà estrema.
description.spanish: Derrota a: Cocito Nifta en dif. extrema.
description.russian: Победите Нифту Коцита на высоком ур. слож.
description.japanese: Extremeモードでコキュートス・ニフタを倒した
description.brazilian: Derrote Nifta do Cócito na dificuldade extrema.

description.english: Complete 15 types of  Party Hero Quests.
description.french: Terminer 15 types de quêtes de héros en groupe.
description.italian: Completa 15 tipi di mis. eroe in gruppo.
description.spanish: Completa 15 tipos de mis. héroe grupo.
description.japanese: ヒーロークエスト（パーティー）を１５種類クリアした
description.brazilian: Conclua 15 tipos de Missões de Herói em grupo.

description.english: Obtain one of the weapons added in "Dissonance of the Nexus".
description.german: Erlange eine der neuen Waffen in Dissonance of the Nexus.
description.french: Obtenir l'une des armes ajoutées dans "Dissonance of the Nexus".
description.italian: Ottieni una delle armi aggiunte con "Dissonance of the Nexus".
description.spanish: Consigue 1 de las armas nuevas de "Dissonance of the Nexus".
description.schinese: 取得雪原的歌姬中追加的武器
description.tchinese: 取得雪原的歌姬中追加的武器
description.russian: Получите любое оружие из Dissonance of the Nexus.
description.japanese: 雪原の歌姫で追加された武器を入手した
description.brazilian: Obtenha uma das armas adicionadas em "Nexo Dissonante".

displayName.japanese: 実はアクセサリーオタクなんです！

description.english: Collect all Emblem Earrings and create a School Uniform F.
description.german: Sammle alle Emblemohrringe und erstelle Schuluniform F.
description.french: Récupérer toutes les boucles d'oreilles emblème et créer un Uniforme scolaire F.
description.italian: Raccogli tutti gli orecchini con emblema e crea una uniforme scolastica F.
description.koreana: 심볼릭 피어스를 전 종류 수집해 학생복 F를 작성했다
description.spanish: Obtén los pendientes de emblema y crea un unif. escolar F.
description.schinese: 搜齐所有种类的象征耳环，并且制作学生服 F
description.tchinese: 蒐齊所有種類的象徵耳環，並且製作學生服 F
description.russian: Соберите все серьги-эмблемы и создайте школьную форму (ж.)
description.japanese: シンボリックピアスを全種類収集して、学生服 Fを作成した
description.brazilian: Colete todos os brincos do emblema para criar um uniforme escolar F.

description.french: Confectionner une Robe chic F.
description.italian: Crea un vestitino chic F.
description.spanish: Crea un vestido a la moda F.
description.japanese: ユビキタスドレス Fを作成した
description.brazilian: Produza um vestido chique F.

description.english: Have sleepovers with Yuna, Eiji, and Seven.
description.german: Verbringe eine Nacht mit jeweils Yuna, Eiji und Seven.
description.french: Faire des soirées pyjama avec Yuna, Eiji et Seven.
description.italian: Ospita Yuna, Eiji e Seven per la notte.
description.koreana: 유나, 에이지, 세븐의 곁잠 이벤트를 봤다
description.spanish: Echa siestas con Yuna, con Eiji y con Seven.
description.schinese: 触发尤娜、瑛二、赛玟的陪睡事件
description.tchinese: 觸發尤娜、瑛二、賽玟的陪睡事件
description.russian: Устройте ночевку с Юной, Эйдзи и Севен.
description.japanese: ユナ、エイジ、セブンの添い寝イベントを発生させた
description.brazilian: Faça uma festa do pijama com Yuna, Eiji e Seven.

displayName.schinese: 总觉得好像是作梦一样
displayName.tchinese: 總覺得好像是作夢一樣

description.english: Have a sleepover with Sachi in Kirito Mode.
description.german: Verbringe eine Nacht mit Sachi im Kirito-Modus.
description.french: Faire une soirée pyjama avec Sachi en mode Kirito.
description.italian: Ospita Sachi per la notte in modalità Kirito.
description.koreana: 키리토 모드에서 사치의 곁잠 이벤트를 봤다
description.spanish: Echa una siesta con Sachi en modo Kirito.
description.schinese: 桐人模式中，触发幸的陪睡事件
description.tchinese: 桐人模式中，觸發幸的陪睡事件
description.russian: Устройте ночевку с Сати в режиме Кирито.
description.japanese: キリトモードでサチの添い寝イベントを発生させた
description.brazilian: Faça uma festa do pijama com Sachi no modo Kirito.
